full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYOB MDOR BSDUS PA'I SMON GYI RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTA'I SNYIGS MA DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG GA-YANG NYAN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' YOD KYANG PHYUGS BZHI LONGS SPYOD NA'ANG STONG STONG PA MED MED PA ZHES PA'I DBANG GIS RKYEN GYIS MA BYAS KYANG MANG PAS NOR GYI LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I DNGOS GRUB ZHU BA'I GA-YANG RIMS PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA MANG YOD KYANG, RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYOBS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA'I MDZAD SOGS SKANG MDOR BSDUS PA ZHIG LAS GZHAN DU MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PAS THOB PAS ZHEG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS PA 'BYUNG BA'I GSUNG YIN PAS DE LAS THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG MCHOD PA BSANGS GA-YANG 'GUGS @009B SOGS KYIS BSKANG TE THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I NGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS MED NA'ANG, 'JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' PHAN SNYAM DKA' BA'I SEMS KYIS BSKUL TE, DGE SLONG GZUNGS 'DZIN AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, MANGGA LAm, ,)
